response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds significant value to me. Given its importance and the benefits it offers, I believe it would be a great fit for you as well. After careful consideration, I am extending a special offer to purchase this product at a price of $1,400,000. This offer reflects my desire to find a mutually beneficial arrangement while ensuring a fair return on my investment. I look forward to discussing this further with you and exploring how we can make this transaction successful. Please let me know if you have any questions or require additional information.", "product_price": 1400000}
